domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @realDonaldTrump Can fines and penalties be issued to people on television that speak about the coronavirus without facts? Freedom of speech is one thing but reporting hysteria should be held the same as someone yelling ‘Fire’ in a movie theater, a good idea for a Presidential executive order.
